original_text: And in the synagogue there was a man who had the spirit of an unclean demon, and he cried out with a loud voice,
korean_text: 회당에 더러운 귀신 들린 사람이 있어 크게 소리 질러 이르되

sentences.original_text: And in the synagogue there was a man
who had the spirit of an unclean demon
and he cried out with a loud voice,
